column4: hey my soundcard doesn't work... when i try to play out of ALSA, but esound works
if there is an esd output for XMMS installed, use it
so kill esd and change all the programs that were using esd to use alsa directly
it's a non-fatal bug because you simply lack that hardware.
can i disable it from starting at all then?
blacklist it: echo shpchp | sudo tee -a /etc/hotplug/blacklist
any idea on my network problem?
I'm really only familiar with the conffile; you could simply change all the interfaces so they don't start up automatically
how do i remove the auto $iface part?
if you're referring to nvidia+nvidia_drv, you actually can but not by default
the option is documented in the readem
